venue.name: Online Flex Meetup Group Connect Room

item.description:
Presentation Description:

Flash Builder 4.5 adds a wealth of new coding features that make Flex and ActionScript developers more productive than ever before. In this session Paul Robertson will demonstrate his favorite coding features and share hints and tips to get the most out of Flash Builder 4.5.


Presenters Bio:

Paul Robertson is a Senior User Experience Developer for Dedo Interactive, Inc., where he designs and develops interactive touch-based experiences for clients. Previously he worked for Adobe with the AIR, ActionScript, and Flash Player teams, and before that as a web applications developer. He is an Adobe certified developer and has been an author and technical editor of ActionScript-related books for Peachpit Press and O’Reilly. Apart from his work, Paul spends his time taking pictures, collecting kitchen gadgets, and attempting to match his three children’s knowledge of Lego, Star Wars trivia, and other equally important subjects.


Join At:

You can join in at http://experts.na3.acrobat.com/ofmg/


Time Check:

Check what time this occurs in your time zone at:
http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?hour=18&min=0&sec=0&p1=98

Logging In:

When you login to the Connect room (the link above)
to view the meeting, PLEASE USE THE "LOGIN AS GUEST" option, and USE YOUR NAME, but do NOT attempt to use your meetup.com username/password or any Connect account. Just sign in as a guest.
item.name: Flash Builder 4.5: Hints and Tips
